src:
Peci Aceh Laris Manis di Festival Piyoh-Piyoh
03 Nov 2019, 19:57 by saifullah nurdin


Peci Aceh Laris Manis di Festival Piyoh-Piyoh

KBRN, Lhoksukon : Peci Aceh dengan motif rencong dan pinto Aceh, yang diproduksi perajin lokal di Kabupaten Aceh Utara, laris  manis di sejumlah Stand Pameran dan festival kreatif, seni serta adat budaya bertajuk ‘Piyoh-Piyoh Festival 2019’, di lapangan upacara Lhoksukon, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Pameran yang diinisiasi oleh Tim Inovatif dan Kreatif Melalui Kolaborasi Nusantara (IKKON) Badan Ekonomi Kreatif (Bekraf) RI bekerjasama dengan Pemerintah Kabupaten Aceh Utara, akan digelar selama tiga hari sejak -1 hingga 3 November 2019. 
Pengrajin peci Aceh Utara 'Sinar Muda' di Stand Kecamatan Syamtalira Bayu, Tgk Nasruddin saat diwawancarai RRI mengatakan, peci motif Aceh sejumlah stand yang ada dilokasi pameran  sangat diminati masyarakat atau pengunjung dibandingkan peci dengan motif lain.
“Setiap ada momen seperti ini, kita dari Usaha Mikro Kecil Menengah (UMKM) selalu hadir untuk ambil bagian setiap stand kita juga ditemani oleh Kuya Ali (Mustafa Kamal) pelawak Aceh,”kata Tgk Nasruddin, disela-sela penutupan Pameran, Minggu (3/11/2019) sore.
Dikatakan, harga jual persatu unit peci Aceh bervariasi mulai Rp 25 ribu hingga Rp 70 ribu tergantung kualitas bahan dan ukurannya, Sehingga sehari omsetnya mecapai Rp1 juta hingga Rp2 Juta, Namun yang menjadi kendala pamerannya hanya tiga hari sejak 1 hingga 3 November.
“Peci khas Aceh telah diminati masyarakat baik dalam daerah maupun luar daerah, termasuk sebagai cenderamata, dengan harapan pemerintah untuk memberikan perhatian terhadap pengusaha peci Aceh local,”pungkasnya.
text:
Peci Aceh Laris Manis in the Piyoh-Piyoh Festival
03 Nov 2019, 19:57 by saifullah nurdin


Peci Aceh Laris Manis in the Piyoh-Piyoh Festival

KBRN, Lhoksukon: Aceh Peci with Aceh rencong and pinto motifs, produced by local craftsmen in North Aceh District, selling well in a number of creative exhibition stands and festivals, arts and cultural traditions entitled 'Piyoh-Piyoh Festival 2019', in the Lhoksukon ceremony field, Sunday (3/11/2019).
The exhibition, initiated by the Innovative and Creative Team Through the Nusantara Collaboration (IKKON) of the Indonesian Creative Economy Agency (Bekraf) in collaboration with the North Aceh Regency Government, will be held for three days from -1 to 3 November 2019.
North Aceh 'Sinar Muda' cap craftsman at Syamtalira Bayu Sub-district Stand, Tgk Nasruddin when interviewed by RRI said, Aceh motif peci of a number of stands at the exhibition location were very popular with the public or visitors compared to cap with other motives.
"Every time there is a moment like this, we from Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) are always present to take part in each of our booths, also accompanied by Kuya Ali (Mustafa Kamal), a comedian of Aceh," said Tgk Nasruddin, on the sidelines of the exhibition closing, Sunday (3 / 11/2019) afternoon.
It is said, the selling price of Aceh cap units by one varies from Rp. 25 thousand to Rp. 70 thousand depending on the quality of the material and its size, so that one day the turnover reaches Rp1 million to Rp. 2 million, but the exhibition is only three days since November 1 to 3.
"Acehnese special cape has attracted the public both in the region and outside the region, including as souvenirs, with the hope of the government to pay attention to local Acehnese cap entrepreneurs," he concluded.
